Actions.Name: Purifying Censer
Actions.Description: The Apothecary summons a censer in range 3.

Summons.Name: Herbal Censer
Summons.Effects: The censer has aura 1. Allies that end their turn inside the censer's aura may save. On a successful save, they end all statuses, blights, and marks of their choice affecting them.
